item.title: [ERI1][Cooling System] - E102H08 / E102H09
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 10, 06:30 - 11:00 UTC

Apr 18, 23:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/05/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 10/05/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Racks will be unavailable during maintenance, we will only shut down one rack at a time and put it back into service before moving on to the next.
- E102H08 starts at 06:30 UTC and ends at 08:30 UTC
- E102H09 starts at 09:00 UTC and ends at 11:00 UTC
Service improvement : We need to perform preventive maintenance on our cooling system.

item.title: [RBX1][Dedicated Servers] - 11C10
item.description:
Apr 26, 04:01 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 26/04/2023 02:54 UTC
End Time : 26/04/2023 03:51 UTC
Root cause : Incident caused by a hardware issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 26, 03:36 UTC
Identified - Start time : 26/04/2023 02:54 UTC
Service impact : The public network is unreachable for all servers in this rack 11C10
Root cause : Incident caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing actions : A replacement of the affected component is in progress.

Apr 26, 03:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/04/2023 02:54 UTC
Service impact : Public network is unreachable for all servers in this rack 11C10
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
